extensionDescription.message: Read YouTube/Twitch livestream chat messages aloud with text-to-speech.

extensionName.message: Livestream Chat Reader - Chat Text-to-Speech for Livestreams

extensionNameShort.description: Short extension name used in UI

voiceTestMessage.message: Hello, this is a test message

speechRateNote.message: Note: Some voices may have problems speaking at rates above 2.0.

speechTemplateDescription.message: Customize how messages are spoken. Use variables %(name) for username and %(body) for message content.

invalidFieldNames.message: Error in speech template: the variable $1 is invalid.

debugPanelDescription.message: This panel is intended for developers and advanced users only.

extensionStateDescription.message: Enable or disable the text-to-speech functionality for livestream chat messages.

themeDescription.message: Choose between light and dark appearance modes.

presetAllowlistUser.message: Speak messages only from a specific user

presetAllowlistUserDescription.message: Only speak messages from a specific user. You need to edit the search pattern to specify the user name.

presetUsageHint.message: Hint: After adding a preset, you can modify settings like "Search pattern" to your preference.

presetUrlBlockDescription.message: Stops reading messages that contain URLs.

presetUrlToLinkDescription.message: Replaces URLs with the word 'link' when reading aloud.

filterOrderNote.message: Note: Filters are applied in top-to-bottom order.

confirmDeleteFilterRule.message: Are you sure you want to delete the filter rule for $1?

invertFilterPattern.message: Invert search condition (e.g., mute users other specified one)

hintFilter.message: Hint: You can use filters. Try creating one!

extensionDisabledTestMessage.message: Extension is disabled. Enable the extension to test the chat text-to-speech functionality.
